details.description: A full-stack product recommendation platform where users can submit product-related queries and receive suggestions from others. The app supports secure authentication, personalized dashboards, and a dynamic feed of recommendations.
challenges: Integrating JWT with Firebase for secure and persistent authentication.
Managing complex user interaction flows across recommendation submissions, likes, and feedback.
Protecting routes and user data access using server-side verification.
improvements: Add machine learning model for personalized recommendation logic.
Include search & filter options for enhanced user experience.
Enable user messaging and notification system.

details.description: HobbyHub allows users to discover, join, and manage local hobby groups like book clubs, hiking teams, or creative circles. Includes admin dashboards, charts, and public group browsing.
challenges: Designing a clean, responsive dashboard UI with real-time analytics (Recharts).
Implementing role-based access for group admins and general users.
Handling dynamic filtering, sorting, and search logic.
improvements: Add in-app messaging between group members.
Enable event creation with calendar reminders and RSVP.
Improve mobile experience with bottom navigation.

details.description: A modern frontend web application that simulates an App Store experience. Users can browse categorized apps, see trending items, and access app details through a stylish and responsive UI.
challenges: Maintaining a fully responsive and visually consistent layout across devices.
Implementing dynamic routing and persistent authentication flow.
Building a reusable and animated category-based filtering system.
improvements: Enable rating and review system for each app.
Add backend database to support real-time app submissions and updates.
